title: Implement CSRF Protection
description: Add CSRF token protection for all web forms and state-changing API endpoints to prevent cross-site request forgery attacks.
completedFeatures: CSRF middleware with Double Submit Cookie pattern
Exempt paths for webhooks and health checks
API key bypass for server-to-server communication
CSRF token endpoint for frontend initialization
acceptanceCriteria: All POST/PUT/DELETE requests require valid CSRF token
Tokens are rotated on each request
